categories

Which of the following are setting options for the User Interface?
*Choose 4 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: Show customer Sidebar Components on All Pages
Enable Drag-and-drop scheduling on List Views

questions.describe: The Report Builder is different from the Report Wizard.

Salesforce.com archives older activities according to which of the following conditions:
*Choose 3 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Events with a due date greater than 365 days old
Open tasks with a due date greater than 365 days old
Closed tasks with a due date greater than 365 days old
Closed tasks without a due date that were created more than 365 days ago

questions.describe: IF(ISPICKVAL(picklist_field)) has the same output as:

At this click path Setup > App Setup > Customize > Tab Names and Labels > Rename Tabs and Labels you can
rename the Tab Names of standard objects.
Is identity confirmation necessary if a user's IP address is known and browser cookie exists?
What is the maximum number of records to be printed in the Printable View of a list view?
Are custom object reports accessible when you add a custom object tab?

answerOptions.describe: Only if the Object is not related to any other object

questions.describe: What is not found on a Company Profile?

Custom Report Types (CRT) allows you to build a framework from which users can create and customize
reports in the report wizard but not in report builder.

A Profile is a collection of settings and permissions that determine what the user can do with records they have
access to and how they view those records.
When are data Validation Rules enforced?
System Administrators have this permission by default.

answerOptions.describe: Both Report Wizard and Report builder

questions.describe: The Salesforce Console is an example of what?
What is the click path to enable Enhance Profile Management?

answerOptions.describe: Setup I Customize I User Interface
Setup I Manage Users I Profiles

questions.describe: Custom formula fields can reference other custom formula fields including themselves.
You must run the report before you can print or export it because the Printable View and Export details buttons are not available in the report builder.

Which Salesforce editions provide option for customizing profiles?
*Choose 2 answers.*
How many profiles can load in a single list view with Enhanced Profile Management enabled?
What is the maximum number of condition highlighting per report?

Which is a capability of the new Service Cloud console?
*Choose 3 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: It provides data visibility by combining a list view and related records on one screen.
It allows agents to view key record information in the highlights panel.
It preserves the context of calls using primary tabs and subtabs.
It allows access to data by opening each record in a new window.
It allows agents to take notes in an interaction log while in a call.

questions.describe:
User A modifies a record. This modification triggers a workflow rule for immediate execution that includes a
field update on the current record. After the execution is complete, what user will be listed under the Last Modified
field of this record?

answerOptions.describe: The last user to modify the record prior to User A

questions.describe: How does Locale settings affect your exported CSV file?

What are two sources from which cases can be created.
*Choose 2 answers.*

Which report format summarizes data in a grid against horizontal and vertical criteria and provides totals for
both rows and columns?
Every profile, including profiles associated with Customer Portal users must have at least one visible app.

Which statements are true about Cloud Scheduler?
*Choose 3 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: It is available in Group, Professional, Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions only.
Cloud Scheduler is now enabled by default for all organizations.

You can automatically see the New Meeting Request button on all eligible contact, lead, and person account
detail pages.

Meeting organizers can not use Cloud Scheduler to request meetings with customers, and have customers
select preferred times before confirming the meeting.

Administrators can add or remove the New Meeting Request button on multiple page layouts using the new
Cloud Scheduler quick setup method.

questions.describe:
Clients do not have to enable Customizable forecasting before they can ask salesforce to activate Territory
Management.

What happens when you convert a Lead and an existing account and contact have the same name as the one
specified on the lead?

answerOptions.describe: The account and contact will automatically be overwritten.
A new account and contact will be created with different Salesforce ID.
You can choose to update the existing account and contact.
